news.title: David Lynch’s Director Chair, Twin Peaks Rug, and More Available at Auction
news.summary: A trove of memorabilia from the late director’s archives will be sold online soon via Julien’s Auctions and Turner Classic Movies

news.title: $ilkMoney Returns With New Song and Video: Watch
news.summary: “Never Trust a Bitch Tha- *Explodes*” is the Virginia rapper’s first solo track in nearly three years

news.title: Whitney Announce North American Tour, Share New Song: Listen
news.summary: “Darling” is the first single from the Chicago band in two years

news.title: Radiohead and the Smile’s Thom Yorke Releases New Song “Dialing In” for Apple TV+ Series Smoke: Listen
news.summary: The Radiohead and Smile frontman has played the previously unreleased track under its former name “Gawpers”

news.title: Maria Somerville Announces North American Tour
news.summary: The Irish musician will play U.S. and Canadian shows before performing at Pitchfork Music Festival London in November

news.title: Pitchfork to Host Turnstile for New Zine Launch Event
news.summary: The band will be joined by writer Lawrence Burney at New York’s AG Studios for a conversation about Pitchfork’s new cover story, Turnstile’s new album, and more

news.title: Silvana Estrada Shares New Song “Como un Pájaro”: Listen
news.summary: The Mexican singer-songwriter’s first new music in two years
